name: Workers’ Rights Program
description: La Raza Centro Legal’s Workers’ Rights Program (WRP) for over 30 years has focused on protecting the rights of low-wage and immigrant workers. We advocate on behalf of very-low wage workers including domestic workers, restaurant workers, car wash workers, construction workers and other low wage immigrant workers who have been cheated out of rightfully earned wages or otherwise exploited by unscrupulous employers. Services provided by our Workers’ Rights Program: - Protects the rights of low-wage
